references.description: The LOINC code refers to Number of steps in unspecified time Pedometer

description: This schema represents number of steps.

references.description: The NCIT code represents standard deviation

$eref.description: The descriptive statistic of a set of measurements. A measurement value can be the result of combining various measurements and calculating descriptive statistics like average, maximum, minimum, etc. Additional descriptive statistics will be added as the need arises. A measurement value without a descriptive statistic is interpreted as being the result of an individual measurement.

anyOf.description: If the value needed is a standard unit of duration, select from the duration-unit-value value set.

___effective_time_frame.description: As a measure of a duration, step count should not be associated to a date time time frame. Hence, effective time frame is restricted to be a time interval.
